body.raw:
### Overview UploadShad is a powerful and easy-to-use file uploader component designed for ShadCN forms and React applications. It provides seamless integration, customizable options, and robust handling of file uploads. ##### Breakdown - Install Shadcn and dependant components - Install UploadShad dependencies - Install UploadShad
### Run the CLI Run the shadcn-ui init command and setup your project with Shadcn:
```bash pnpx shadcn@latest init ``` ### Add UploadShad Install the dependant modules
```bash pnpx shadcn@latest add https://uploadshad.nerfdesigns.com/registry/uploadshad.json ``` This uses the (new) ShadCN CLI to add UploadShad dependencies into your project ### Environment Variable For UploadShad to upload & delete images in your S3 Bucket, add these AWS configuration Environment Variables to your .env file. UploadShad ensures that variables without the "NEXT_PUBLIC" prefix remain secured on the server, and are not exposed to the client.
``` NEXT_PUBLIC_HOST_URL= AWS_BUCKET_NAME= AWS_BUCKET_REGION= AWS_BUCKET_ACCESS_KEY= AWS_BUCKET_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY= AWS_BUCKET_PRODUCTION_FOLDER= NEXT_PUBLIC_AWS_BASE_URL= ``` ### Thats it! You have successfully installed UploadShad into your project. ðŸŽ‰ Learn more about [ShadCN CLI](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/cli) Learn more about [Integrating with Shadcn Form](/integrations/shadcn-form) Learn more about [Integrating with React Hook Form](/integrations/react-hook-form) Learn more about [uploading Files to the Cloud (database/API).](/) Learn more about [how file state management works](/file-state-management), useful for more custom integrations/use cases.

UploadShad to upload & delete images in your S3 Bucket, add these AWS configuration Environment Variables to your .env file.\r
UploadShad ensures that variables without the "NEXT_PUBLIC" prefix remain secured on the server, and are not exposed to the client.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\uploadshad\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-33111d65-4306-476c-b3de-619791c51e7c.mdx",lineNumber:44,columnNumber:1},this),(0,d.jsxDEV)("br",{},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\uploadshad\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-33111d65-4306-476c-b3de-619791c51e7c.mdx",lineNumber:47,columnNumber:1},this),(0,d.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,d.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:`NEXT_PUBLIC_HOST_URL=<http://localhost:3000 ensure you update this in production>\r
AWS_BUCKET_NAME=<bucket name>\r
AWS_BUCKET_REGION=<bucket region>\r
AWS_BUCKET_ACCESS_KEY=<your access key>\r
AWS_BUCKET_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=<your secret key>\r
AWS_BUCKET_PRODUCTION_FOLDER=<example folder>\r
NEXT_PUBLIC_AWS_BASE_URL=<https://example.s3.region.amazonaws.com>
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\uploadshad\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-33111d65-4306-476c-b3de-619791c51e7c.mdx",lineNumber:49,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\uploadshad\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-33111d65-4306-476c-b3de-619791c51e7c.mdx",lineNumber:49,columnNumber:1},this),(0,d.jsxDEV)(n.h3,{children:"Thats it!"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\uploadshad\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-33111d65-4306-476c-b3de-619791c51e7c.mdx",lineNumber:59,columnNumber:1},this),(0,d.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"You have successfully installed UploadShad into your project. \u{1F389}"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\uploadshad\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-33111d65-4306-476c-b3de-619791c51e7c.mdx",lineNumber:61,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\uploadshad\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-33111d65-4306-476c-b3de-619791c51e7c.mdx",lineNumber:18,columnNumber:1},this),`
